name: Koala Lens Cleaning Cloth | Japanese Microfiber | Glasses Cleaning Cloths | Eyeglass Lens Cleaner | Eyeglasses, Camera, VR/AR Headset, and Screen Cleaner | Black & Green (Pack of 6)
short_description: UNPARALLELED CRYSTAL-CLEAR PERFORMANCE: The only obsessively engineered, best-in-class microfiber cleaning cloth, meticulously crafted from proprietary, ultra-dense, super-absorbent Japanese woven fabric, effortlessly absorbing the toughest dirt, grime, and oils - leaving your lenses spotless - every time.

EXPERIENCE THE POWER OF JAPANESE MICROFIBER: Not all microfiber is created equally. Actually, our biggest competitor is our own relentless drive for next-level performance. Koala cloth is engineered from our ultra-fine, super-dense, and totally lint-free Japanese micro fiber cloth, woven in our max performance honeycomb matrix.

PRECISION CARE FOR ALL OPTICS: From anti-reflective and anti-glare coatings to polarized sunglasses, professional camera lenses, and touch screens - our microfiber cloth offers unparalleled performance on all surfaces. We're best-in-class for AR / VR smart glasses and headsets, telescopes, binoculars, and all other optical precision devices.

UNRIVALED DURABILITY KEEPS ON CLEANING: Washable and reusable dozens of times each, our performance cleaning cloth outperforms other reusable and disposable alternatives, reducing waste, while maximizing value. Simply wash by hand with cold water and mild soap, then hang to air dry!

JOIN THE KOALA FAMILY – INTEGRITY MATTERS: When you choose Koala, you're joining a thriving community of millions who rely on us for their precision lens and device care needs. We believe lenses and screens have integrity too, and deserve supercharged, long lasting performance. We exist to serve that vision.

product_description: Windex Ammonia-Free Glass Wipes offer the easiest way to get a streak-free shine almost anywhere. These ammonia free glass cleaner wipes gently remove smudges, fingerprints and dust without damaging or leaving any residue behind. Perfect as mirror wipes, car glass cleaner wipes, or window cleaner wipes, use these multisurface cleaning wipes to add a little sparkle to your life any time. Grab a wipe for quick touchups or to clean smaller glass surfaces like framed photos, bathroom mirrors or glass microwave doors. All you have to do is peel back the seal on the pouch, remove a wipe and reseal the pouch to preserve moisture. Wipe any surface you want to clean and discard the wipe once it gets dirty or dries out. Give Life a Sparkle with Windex!
